Great torrent!
I hade som problem to install it on my Vista 32bit computer. The solution was to turn on the firewall.
For anyone else experiencing this problem it's a bug in the installer related to Windows Firewall. You must have it on and the associated service started for it to install correctly.
It's also a problem for the 64bits Vista I heard.
